any_string_or_empty.description: This must be any or empty string

cookie_domain.description: Value should be the same as the httpd_fqdn.

filesystem_size.description: This is the filesystem size in either M (MB) or G (GB). This must be an decimal between 0 and 9999, eg 0.5G / 200M

hostname.description: This must be a valid hostname

instances.description: This must be a valid number of instances from 0 upwards

ipv4.description: This must be a valid ipv4 address

ipv4_vio_common.description: This must be a valid ipv4 address or left blank

ipv4_vio_single.description: This must be a valid ipv4 address or left blank

ipv4_vio_multi.description: This must be a valid ipv4 address or left blank

ipv4_cidr.description: This must be a valid ipv4 cidr

ipv4_external.description: This must be a valid ipv4 address on the external network

ipv4_external_list.description: This must be a comma seperated list of ipv4 addresses on the external network

ipv4_external_share_list.description: This must be a comma seperated list of ipv4 addresses or empty string. This field can be left empty if there is no NFS external clients. NFS will share on the external network to the list of IP addresses provided. For initial ENIQ integration refer to OSS Configuration for ENIQ Statistics. For integration with any other system the following openstack ingress security group rules need to be added TCP and UDP ports 111, 2049, and 20048. At upgrade these IP's must be retained otherwise connection to external client will be lost.

ipv6_external_share_list.description: This must be a comma seperated list of ipv6 addresses or empty string. This field can be left empty if there is no NFS external clients. NFS will share on the external network to the list of IP addresses provided. For initial ENIQ integration refer to OSS Configuration for ENIQ Statistics. For integration with any other system the following openstack ingress security group rules need to be added TCP and UDP ports 111, 2049, and 20048. At upgrade these IP's must be retained otherwise connection to external client will be lost.

ipv4_internal.description: This must be a valid ipv4 address on the internal network

ipv4_internal_list.description: This must be a comma seperated list of ipv4 addresses on the internal network

ipv4_list.description: This must be a comma seperated list of ipv4 addresses

ipv4_netmask.description: This must be a valid netmask

ipv6.description: This must be a valid ipv6 address

ipv6_vio_common.description: This must be a valid ipv6 address or left blank

ipv6_vio_single.description: This must be a valid ipv6 address or left blank

ipv6_vio_multi.description: This must be a valid ipv6 address or left blank

ipv6_cidr.description: This must be a valid ipv6 cidr

ipv6_external.description: This must be a valid ipv6 address on the external network

ipv6_external_list.description: This must be a comma seperated list of ipv6 addresses on the external network

ipv6_internal.description: This must be a valid ipv6 address on the internal network

ipv6_internal_list.description: This must be a comma seperated list of ipv6 addresses on the internal network

ldap_root_suffix.description: This should be a valid ldap root suffix

openstack_flavor.description: This must be a valid openstack flavor name. The flavor must have at minimum the number of vCPUs and MB of memory specified

openstack_image_name.description: This must be a valid and unique openstack image name or id

port_number.description: This must be a valid port number

positive_integer.description: This must be a positive integer

string_len2.description: This should be a string up to 2 characters

string_len64.description: This should be either a string up to 64 characters

true_false.description: This should be either true, or false

disabled_enabled.description: This should be either disabled, or enabled

url.description: This must be a valid url

virtual_router_identifier.description: The LVS router uses VRRP (Virtual Router Redundancy Protocol) to control on which LVS node the VIPs should be assigned. A uniqie ID is required within the network to distinguish from other routers which may use the same protocol. Not assigning a unique ID will lead to connectivity issues

volume_size.description: This is the volume size in GB. This must be an integer between 1 and 9999, eg 50

volume_snap.description: Create a snapshot for backup/rollback should be either yes or no.

vio_common_hostname.description: This must be a valid hostname

vio_single_hostname.description: This must be a valid hostname

vio_multi_hostname.description: This must be a valid hostname

vio_common_positive_integer.description: This must be a positive integer

vio_single_positive_integer.description: This must be a positive integer

vio_multi_positive_integer.description: This must be a positive integer

deployment_type.description: This must be one of the following deployment types Small_ENM_customer_cloud, SIENM_multi_technology, SIENM_transport_only, ENM_extra_small, ENM_feature_test_multi_instance, or ENM_feature_test_single_instance.

domain_stack_create_throttle_value.description: Must be a non negative integer. It is set by default based on deployment type. This paramater is used to throttle stack creation at domain phase.

cnom_optionality_status.description: Creates cnom on ENM, should be either yes or no.

udcdashboard_optionality_status.description: Creates udcdashboard on ENM, should be either yes or no.

parameters.description: Please fill in all required fields

deployment_id.description: Unique string to identify deployment. Must be 17 characters or less in length and only contain numbers, letters, and dashes. Must not be in integer.

internal_port_security_enabled.description: Disable or Enable Internal Port Security. The default value is "true". Setting to "false" disables port security and removes allowed address pairs and security groups from internal ports. For NFVI (when SDN is deployed) the value must be set to False.

ip_version.description: Specifies which external IP versions to use, 'v4' for IPv4 only external, 'v6' for IPv6 only external and 'dual' for IPv4 and IPv6

lvs_advert_interval.description: VRRP Protocol parameter for lvs router to set frequency of advertisements between MASTER and SLAVE for keepalived

external_mtu.description: MTU value of ENM's External (Provider) Network. In the case where the eth1 interface is configured statically, this value will be used to set the MTU. This value should match the MTU setting of the external network as shown by the OpenStack commands "openstack network show <network>" or "neutron net-show <net-id> --field mtu".

server_group_policy.description: This is auto-populated based on the deployment type. Should not be changed

host_system_identifier.description: Unique string to distinguish different deployments. Usually a subdomain of the FQDN

neo4j_cluster.description: This can be causal or single

neo4j_cc_ip_internal.description: Separate IP address for the Neo4j Consistency Check single instance.

LDAP_ADMIN_PASSWORD.description: LDAP Admin Password. This must be set to "ldapadmin"

default_security_admin_password.description: Default Security Admin Password. This must be set to "TestPassw0rd"

openidm_admin_password.description: Openidm Admin Password. This must be set to "OpenidmAdm01"

postgresql01_admin_password.description: Postgres Password. This must be set to "P0stgreSQL11"

ha_policy.description: NFvI ha policy metadata tag. This must be set to "unmanaged"

parameters.title: Site Engineering Data for ENM on Cloud
